Property.Name: ApplicationContext
Property.Comment: For Which Application Or Tool Is The Scenario.

Property.Name: ContactPerson
Property.Comment: An Contact Person If You Have Questions About The Scenario.

Property.Name: DescriptionMarkdown
Property.Comment: An Markdown Content Where You Can Describe The Scenario And The Excepted Result.

Property.Name: DescriptionStylesheet
Property.Comment: An Optional Stylesheet To Use For Rendering The Generated HTML.
